lead_paragraph: An adviser to the prime minister said the American drone strike that killed Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour was a violation of Pakistan’s sovereignty.

headline.print_headline: 5 Days After U.S. Strike, Pakistan Confirms Death of Taliban Leader
headline.main: Pakistan Finally Confirms Taliban Leader’s Death in U.S. Strike

snippet: An adviser to the prime minister said the American drone strike that killed Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour was a violation of Pakistan’s sovereignty.
abstract: Pakistan officially confirms death of former Taliban leader Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour in American drone strike; five day delay in announcement was due to spike in diplomatic tensions between United States and Pakistan, which claims strike violated its sovereignty and impairs Afghan peace talks.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
